<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=342) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 138 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Primal Focus leads to...</title>
[Primal Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=352)
name: Primal Focus
